prompt: Design a minimalist flashcards study interface with a clean white background and subtle design elements. Focus on typography and whitespace for a distraction-free learning experience. The flashcard should be displayed as a simple bordered rectangle with minimal shadow and clean lines. Use a monochromatic color scheme with shades of gray and a single accent color like soft blue for interactive elements. Include a simple text-based progress indicator without unnecessary graphics. The header should be clean and minimal with just the essential title and a single settings icon. Navigation should use simple arrow buttons without heavy styling. The flip button should be a basic outlined button with clean text. Bottom actions should be represented as simple text links or minimal icon buttons arranged in a clean row. Emphasize readability and focus with generous whitespace and restrained visual design.
